授業方法:
This class will be conducted in English only, and students are expected to use English exclusively while participating.
This course meets three times per week, and we will be exploring and researching current issues that have a great impact on our world. Some classes will be basically a seminar and pair-work format; other days will focus on presentation and discussion skills; One day a week will generally be devoted to writing and some research. Some limited lecture time will occur throughout the course. Currently, this course is intended to be taught face-to-face; however, adaptations may be made in light of changing conditions and university policies.
